basics.name: Try Wijono
basics.label: Frontend Engineering Lead
basics.summary:
I am a self learned software engineering tech lead tampered with diverse experiences from project management and data analytics in the energy industry.

Currently dealing mostly with Next JS, React JS and Node JS.

references.name: Alvin Foo
references.reference:
Try and I are founding members of ExxonMobil Singapore's Sustainability Employee Engagement Drive team. 

Try has a pleasant and people-focused personality which makes him an asset to any team. He is also responsible and exhibits great creativity in publicity-related design work. 

He has a passion for helping the community, and was involved in the company's efforts in blood donation and a grocery drop programme to low-income families.

awards.title: IMDA SG Digital Postgraduate Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded Postgraduate scholarship to puruse master in computing in National University of Singapore (NUS)

awards.title: Engineering and Innovation Design 3rd Prize Award for safety category
awards.awarder: Nanyang Technological University and ST Engineering
awards.summary:
Designed front brake light for cars to signal pedestrians and other motorists upon stopping. The features of the prototype are as follow:
•	Easy implementation -> Similarity to rear brake lights helps road users to recognize the signals on sight
•	Easy installation -> Direct connection to the car's power output 
•	Easy Vision -> Optimized setup angle to reduce possibility of glare towards road users

highlights: Lead 3 engineers in developing ReactJS based web application that serves 0.5 million users daily
Drive technical implementation to improve SEO performance
Lead technical project of migrating legacy codebase to NextJS based web application
Assessed technical feasibility during product planning
Coordinated technical implementation and sequences to ensure smooth sprint development
Contributed to product features development while leading cross-functional teams
Architected and developed regional codebase with NextJS and i18n integration
Implemented MVP architecture of translation process on client side without paid services
Strengthened authentication security with end-to-end password encryption
Boosted 35% of enquiries / enquirer by implementing the simplification of user enquiry flow
Improved 20% of enquiry conversion by delivering major revamp to search filter UX
Developed and Maintained LIMS Software (based on .NET and C#) features ensuring seamless 24/7 global operation across 20+ sites in 9 countries
Slashed US$ 1 M of OPEX opportunity cost by performing in depth license utilization analysis with PowerBI + Oracle DB connection
Developed new features for in-house VBA based tool that eliminates human error and prevents potential US$ 1 M demurrage impact to lab operations

volunteer.position: Founding Member of Sustainability Employee Engagement Drive (SEED)
summary: Organize roadshow events to raise environment sustainability awareness to employees in Singapore
Led nationwide Singapore internal publicity newsletter to raise awareness on environmental sustainability

volunteer.position: Vice Chairperson for Orientation for New Employees Singapore (ONES) Committee
summary: Led 15 employees to organize 9 orientation events (scale of 100+ new employees) over 1 year period
Smoothen new employees' assimilation into the company with business overviews and networking-based events
Boosted 30% event participation rate with grassroots marketing and effective publicity approach
